title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H1 – Jul 9 2021
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H1 – Jul 9 2021
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1:


Rand Paul introduced bill to lift mask mandate on airlines. The drive for federally mandated vaccines ramps up. Many corporations, like Big Tech, will push for vaccines. "No Jab, No Job." The left is counting on pandemic exhaustion to continue coronavirus lockdown, mandates, and reduction of personal freedoms. This fall, will kids be forced to wear masks in school? Parents need to stand up and fight for no CRT or masks in schools.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
